data.message: hello, i received an odd fr from a lady named ritson chasity. her profile page says she is a "claim agent" for facebook headquartes and her cover photo say National Lottery Administration here's her response when i asked her why she's requested me:   "i am here to pass some important messages to you concerning your Facebook account,but before i can proceed kindly accept my friend request". she wouldn't give me the "info" unless i accepted....i did not accept because i felt that something wasn't right....do you know this woman who claims to be an agent at your headquarters?

replies.message: Hey Amira, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/209TZyX. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kate
thank you. i did hit spam on her after denying her request. i did not give her any information at all. but i wanted to report this in case it wasn't real. and thank you for verifying so!
